synopsis.text: Gundam Unicorn fans and music enthusiasts alike can enjoy the captivating music video for "RE: I AM" by Japanese singer Aimer. This song, which has been featured in the Mobile Suit Gundam Unicorn series, serves as both the ending theme for episode 6 and the opening for episode 18 of Mobile Suit Gundam Unicorn RE:0096. Directed by Tsuyoshi Araki, the music video was initially included as a DVD bonus with the first limited edition release of Aimer's 5th single. Dive into the immersive world of Gundam Unicorn while being serenaded by Aimer's enchanting vocals and visually stunning imagery.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
